items.content_html: Overide (pronounced over¬∑ide) is a lightweight, yet powerful CLI tool that seamlessly integrates AI-powered code generation into your development workflow. It works platform-agnostically with OpenAI, DeepSeek, and Groq to provide intelligent code suggestions and updates directly in your preferred code editor - no extensions required.
